short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extracts notes taken from the Udemy cource page and exports it as an HTML or Markdown file

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Udemy Notes Extractor

What is the one feature you wish Udemy had? The ability to extract the notes you've created!

Introducing the Udemy Notes Extractorâ€”your go-to Chrome extension for effortlessly extracting and saving your Udemy course notes. With just a few clicks, you can export your valuable notes in your preferred format, making them easy to access, customize, and share.

How It Works:
1. Go to the course page you wish to extract your notes from in Udemy.
2. Make sure you have all lectures selected and they are sorted by oldest.
3. Enter File Name: Simply enter the name you want for your extracted notes file.
4. Choose Your Format: Select between two versatile file formats:
   - HTML File: Perfect for hassle-free usage. Easily view your notes in any web browser or convert them to PDF for offline access.
   - Markdown: Ideal for those who love customization. Edit and format your notes in any Markdown editor to suit your needs.
5. Hit Extract: Click the extract button, and voila! Your Udemy notes are ready for you to download.

Why You'll Love It:

- User-Friendly: Designed with simplicity in mind, making it easy for anyone to use.
- Flexible Formats: Whether you need a polished HTML file or a customizable Markdown document, we've got you covered.
- Future Updates: We're always improving! A new option to extract your notes in PDF format is currently in development.

Don't let your hard-earned notes stay trapped in Udemy. Download the Udemy Notes Extractor today and take control of your learning materials!
